snippet: The Rangers and the Flyers play in the first-and fourth-largest TV markets in the country and also have a venomous history that is hard to equal.
abstract: The Rangers and the Flyers play in the first-and fourth-largest TV markets in the country and also have a venomous history that is hard to equal.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Rangers and Flyers Bring Bare-Knuckle History to a Showcase
headline.print_headline: Rangers and Flyers Bring Bare-Knuckle History to a Showcase
